text: @realDonaldTrump Don’t forget to offer condolences to the 120 thousand plus Americans experiencing their first 4th of July with empty chairs representing their loved ones who lost the COVID-19 battle.  Make sure you tell them you are sorry you killed their loved ones because of your stupidity!!!!
